mapper.select: select tb.blog_id as blog_id , tb.blog_title as blog_title , tb.blog_author_id as blog_author_id, ta.author_id as author_id , ta.author_username as author_username , ta.author_password as author_password , ta.author_email as author_email , tp.post_id as post_id, tp.post_blog_id as post_blog_id, tp.post_content as post_content , tp.post_draft as post_draft from tb_blog tb left outer join tb_author ta on tb.blog_author_id = ta.author_id left outer join tb_post tp on tb.blog_id = tp.post_blog_id where tb.blog_id = #{id}
